actions.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Nunn. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 163.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1990 for the Army and Marine Corps for research, development, test, and evaluation to develop improved weapons and equipment for small infantry units.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990 for the Army and Marine Corps for research, development, test, and evaluation of weapons and equipment for small infantry units.

titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1990 for the Army and Marine Corps for research, development, test, and evaluation to develop improved weapons and equipment for small infantry units.
